pages.text: An {b æolipile} is a primitive steam engine that converts the propelling force of steam into rotary force. Æolipiles are the only devices in Convivium to power mechanisms.
When placed on a stew pot with water inside and heated by a heat source, an æolipile will start rotating. The force it generates depends on the intensity of heat.
You must use {(mechanisms/kinetic_transmission)gears} to transmit the generated rotary force.
